Barycenters
================================================

Implementations for optimal transport barycenters are still particularly experimental.
They work in principle but they do not yet provide mathematically sound sub-optimality control for truncation.
Also the setup of such problems is considerably more complex.
   
.. autoclass:: MultiScaleOT.TMultiScaleSetupBarycenterContainer
   :members:
   :special-members:

.. autoclass:: MultiScaleOT.TSinkhornSolverBarycenter
   :members:
   :special-members:

.. autoclass:: MultiScaleOT.TSinkhornSolverBarycenterKLMarginals
   :members:
   :special-members:
